title: Home
text:
I am Daniele Cannatella, Assistant Professor in Urban Data for Design at the Faculty of Architecture and the Built Environment, TU Delft, Department of Urbanism.
My work bridges spatial analytics, climate adaptation, and landscape-based regional design to support evidence-based planning and design for resilient and sustainable cities.
I collaborate with municipalities, research institutions, and students to develop strategies that combine analytical rigor with design innovation.

title: Home
text:
Research & Collaboration — Developing tools and methods that integrate data analysis with design practice.

Applied Projects — Working with municipalities and regions to address climate adaptation and spatial resilience.

Teaching & Supervision — Guiding MSc and PhD students in data-driven urbanism, design methods, and spatial analytics.
